recipes.name: AeroPress
steps: Weigh out 30g of whole bean coffee
Grind coffee beans to medium consistency
Dump coffee grounds into filter basket
Place AeroPress on your favorite mug
Pour heated water into brewing chamber up to the '2' marker
Brew for 15 seconds...no more, no less
Add more hot water and half and half to taste
